lastSession.summary: Enhanced /fix and /refactor to create proper tool configs (ruff, eslint, knip) before running. Renamed /plan to /spec to avoid built-in conflict.

shipped.summary: Add config creation for linting/analysis tools in /fix and /refactor
Rename /plan to /spec to avoid built-in command conflict
Enhance /push: CI status check + pre-push lint detection
Add /spec for spec-driven planning before complex tasks
Add /agent and /mcp commands for SDK project auditing
Add /fix (auto-fix linting, formatting, unused imports) and /test (run tests intelligently)
Rewrite /prompt with internal prompting philosophy (principles over rules, example trap, quick reference checklists)
